by_wp_id_short.map: function (doc) {  if (doc.we_source == 'wenotes_wp') {    emit(doc.from_user_wp_id, [doc.site_id, doc.tags, doc.from_user, doc.from_user_name, doc.feed_url, doc.we_timestamp]);  }}

by_wp_id_and_url.map: function (doc) {  if (doc.we_source == 'wenotes_wp') {    emit([doc.from_user_wp_id, doc.feed_url], [doc.site_id, doc.tags, doc.from_user, doc.from_user_name, doc.we_timestamp]);  }}

by_site_id_short.map: function (doc) {  if (doc.we_source == 'wenotes_wp') {    emit(doc.site_id, [doc.from_user_wp_id, doc.tags, doc.from_user, doc.from_user_name, doc.feed_url, doc.we_timestamp]);  }}
